mapper.select: SELECT d.drug_code AS drugCode, d.drug_name AS drugName, d.unit_price As unitPrice, COALESCE(d.quantity, 0) AS totalQuantity, COALESCE(d.location, '-') AS location, d.expiration_date AS expirationDate, d.supplier AS supplier, d.min_stock AS minStock, dc.is_checked AS isChecked FROM drug d LEFT join drug_check dc on d.drug_code = dc.drug_code
SELECT quantity FROM drug WHERE drug_code = #{drugCode}
select drug_code from drug_check where check_date >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') AND check_date <= LAST_DAY(CURDATE())

SELECT dcd.detail_id, dcd.check_id, dcd.status, dcd.quantity as quantity, dcd.note, dcd.is_checked, d.drug_name, d.expiration_date, d.location, d.unit, d.supplier, d.insurance_code, d.min_stock, d.quantity as totalQuantity FROM drug_check_detail dcd join drug_check dc on dcd.check_id = dc.check_id join drug d on d.drug_code = dc.drug_code WHERE dcd.check_id = #{checkId} ORDER BY FIELD(dcd.status, 'PASS', 'WARNING', 'DISPOSE')
select d.drug_name, d.unit, d.unit_price, dc.check_id, d.supplier, d.quantity as totalQuantity, d.location from drug_check dc join drug d on dc.drug_code = d.drug_code
mapper.insert: insert into drug_log(drug_code, type, quantity, before_stock,after_stock, memo) values(#{drugCode},#{type},#{quantity},#{beforeStock},#{afterStock},#{memo})
